Title: Authorizes the use of school facilities by not-for-profit or charitable organizations for the operation of after-school programs
Summary: Authorizes the use of school facilities by not-for-profit or charitable organizations for the operation of after-school programs; requires programs to present some form of educational instruction or academic material, or promote physical education, arts instruction, community service or other activities to promote youth development; provides the school district shall provide such facilities at no fee or for a minimal fee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to use of school facilities by not-for-profit and charitable organizations for after-school programs
